thread.title: BRIEF-Holloway Lodging Reports Q4 FFO $0.21 Per Basic Share

title: BRIEF-Holloway Lodging Reports Q4 FFO $0.21 Per Basic Share
text: March 7, 2018 / 7:45 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Holloway Lodging Reports Q4 FFO $0.21 Per Basic Share Reuters Staff March 7 (Reuters) - Holloway Lodging Corp: * HOLLOWAY LODGING CORPORATION REPORTS 2017 YEAR END RESULTS AND DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND * HOLLOWAY LODGING CORP - QTRLY FUNDS FROM OPERATIONS PER BASIC SHARE $0.21 * HOLLOWAY LODGING CORP - QTRLY ADJUSTED FFO PER BASIC SHARE $0.19 * HOLLOWAY LODGING CORP - “LOOKING FORWARD TO A SMALLER CAPITAL BUDGET IN 2018” * HOLLOWAY LODGING CORP - ANTICIPATE FREE CASH FLOW WILL INCREASE IN 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
